channel.title: Can you make npcs shoot spells?
channel.description:
Hi i have finished coding many things for my server and i am running out of ideas for updates!
Is there really a way to make an npc shoot spells like ice barrage or blood barrage?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2007, 03:35:47 PM[/size][hr]:(

item.title: Can you make npcs shoot spells?
item.dc:creator: @r1ch_kid r1ch kid
item.description:
@r1ch_kid wrote:

well yes in pest control i think sam made it so that the void knight shoots like jad

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make npcs shoot spells?
